```{r,echo=FALSE}
library(numbers)
options(scipen=999)
pfix = function(c,d){
    cc = c[c!=0]
    dd = d[c!=0]
    p = paste0("{",cc,"}x^{",dd,"}",collapse="+")
    p = gsub("x^{0}","",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("x^{1}","x",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("+{-","-{",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("+{1}x","+x",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("-{1}x","-x",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("{-1}x","-x",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("{1}x","x",p,fixed=T)
    return(p)
}

gcd2 <- function(a, b) {
    if (b == 0) a else Recall(b, a %% b)
}
gcd <- function(...) Reduce(gcd2, c(...))


primes = c(2,3,5,7)

while(T){
    pr = sample(primes,2,T)
    xsq = pr[1]^2*pr[2]
    if(xsq <= 175){break}
}


ach = character()
for(i in 1:length(primes)){
    for(j in 1:length(primes)){
        ach = c(ach,paste0("x=\\pm",primes[i],"\\sqrt{",primes[j],"}",collapse=""))
    }
}

al = paste0("* $",ach,"$",collapse="\n")


pfs = primeFactors(xsq)
tp = table(pfs)
pf = paste0(names(tp),"^{",as.vector(tp),"}",collapse="\\cdot")


ann = paste0("x=\\pm",pr[1],"\\sqrt{",pr[2],"}",collapse="")

sol = paste0(1*(ann==ach),collapse="")

```

Question
========

Find all solutions to the equation below:

$$x^2~=~`r xsq`$$


Answerlist
-------

`r al`


Solution
========

$$x^2~=~`r xsq`$$

$$x~=~\pm\sqrt{`r xsq`}$$

Find the [prime factorization](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fundamental_theorem_of_arithmetic) of `r xsq`. You can do this with a [factor tree](https://www.khanacademy.org/math/pre-algebra/pre-algebra-factors-multiples/pre-algebra-prime-factorization-prealg/v/prime-factorization). You should find that $`r xsq`=`r pf`$.

$$x~=~\pm\sqrt{`r pf`}$$

[Simplify the square root](https://www.khanacademy.org/math/algebra/x2f8bb11595b61c86:rational-exponents-radicals/x2f8bb11595b61c86:simplifying-square-roots/v/simplifying-square-roots-1).


$$x~=~\pm `r pr[1]` \sqrt{`r pr[2]`}$$
